name: intelligent-assistant
description: AI-powered administrative assistant for Australian trade businesses

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:shared -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:shared
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist shared/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
